paragraphs.body: On Avatar Wiki, both Mainspace and Fanon Portal, all pages and articles must be categorized, this includes the category pages. As aforementioned, a category tree provides a dynamic view of Avatar Wiki's category structure. This structure is created by the categorization of categories, which creates a tree-like structure, giving users the ability to effectively search through categories.
